comment._content: Ethel Helen Lindner Belmont (aka, "Ethel Lorraine"), who was involved in the Gates/Herrman marriage annulment situation (see Dorothy Gates Herrman, next photo). Mrs. Ethel L. Belmont was caring for Dorothy Gates Herrman (a minor) at her apartment in New York City during the scandal. Mrs. Belmont was herself a former showgirl, and in the midst of a separation from Raymond Belmont: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F00A16F93D5F13738... query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F10712FC3C5E13738... query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F70D13F93A5813738... Her friend Dorothy, wearing the same fur? [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/8414569370/]

comment._content: pennylrichardsca:  This does appear to be Ethel Helen (Lindner) Belmont , who was going through a separation from her husband Raymond Belmont. We will add more information when we update. The stole does seem to be the same one that Dorothy Gates Herrman  is wearing.
